parameters.name: Applicants
parameters.description: Objects containing the applicant data. There must be at least one applicant for the request to succeed. The array of objects may contain a mix of Individual and Corporate applicants.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.Contact.NationalIdentifier.CountryOfNationality
parameters.description: The applicant's country of national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.Contact.PepDetails
parameters.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.Signatories.Capacity
parameters.description: Director = 0, SoleDirector = 1, CompanySecretary = 2, Partner = 3, Trustee = 4, SignedUnderSeal = 5, SignificantShareholder = 6, Beneficiary = 7.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.Signatories.NationalIdentifier.CountryOfNationality
parameters.description: The applicant's country of national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.Signatories.ReceiveCommunicationByPost
parameters.description: If you would like to opt out of electronic communications.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.Signatories.PepDetails
parameters.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.CountryOfIncorporation
parameters.description: Country of Incorporation of the Company

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.DateOfIncorporation
parameters.description: Date of Incorporation of the Company

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.NatureOfActivities
parameters.description: The nature of activities that the Company performs.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.ContactIsDirectorOrSignificantShareholder
parameters.description: Whether the contact is a signatory on the account.

parameters.name: Applicants.CorporateDetails.TradingName
parameters.description: Trading name of the corporate applicant.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.TaxResidences.From
parameters.description: From date that applicant held tax residence in that country.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.TaxResidences.To
parameters.description: To date that applicant held tax residence in that country.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.TaxResidences.NoDocument
parameters.description: If the appplicant does not hold a identification document.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.UsPerson
parameters.description: Select if applicant is from the US.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.SourceOfWealth
parameters.description: Provide the applicant's source of wealth.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.NationalIdentifier.CountryOfNationality
parameters.description: The applicant's country of national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.ReceiveCommunicationByPost
parameters.description: If you would like to opt out of electronic communications.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.Title
parameters.description: Title: Mr, Mrs, Ms, Miss, Doctor, Lady, Prof and Sir.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.DateOfBirth
parameters.description: Date of birth of the individual.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.Phone
parameters.description: Primary contact number of the individual.

parameters.name: Applicants.IndividualDetails.PepDetails
parameters.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

parameters.name: Applicants.TrustDetails.NatureOfTrust
parameters.description: Nature of the trust. Bare = 0, Charitable = 1, Will = 2, Interest in posession = 3, Discretionary = 4, Accumulation = 5, Settlor interested = 6, Granted = 7, Single Persion Pension = 8, Mulitple Member Personal Pension = 9, Single Member SSAS = 10, Multiple Member SSAS = 11, Loan = 12,.

parameters.name: Applicants.TrustDetails.Signatories.Capacity
parameters.description: Director = 0, SoleDirector = 1, CompanySecretary = 2, Partner = 3, Trustee = 4, SignedUnderSeal = 5, SignificantShareholder = 6, Beneficiary = 7.

parameters.name: Applicants.TrustDetails.Signatories.NationalIdentifier.CountryOfNationality
parameters.description: The applicant's country of national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.TrustDetails.Signatories.ReceiveCommunicationByPost
parameters.description: If you would like to opt out of electronic communications.

parameters.name: Applicants.TrustDetails.Signatories.PepDetails
parameters.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

parameters.description: Date of Incorporation of the Company

parameters.name: Applicants.TrustDetails.CorporateTrustees.NatureOfActivities
parameters.description: The nature of activities that the Company performs.

parameters.name: Accounts
parameters.description: Array of accounts to be opened with the application. Must be linked to an included applicant.

parameters.name: Accounts.BankAccounts.Bic
parameters.description: The Bank Identifier Code (BIC) of your banking institution.

parameters.name: Accounts.BankAccounts.Iban
parameters.description: The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of your banking institution.

parameters.name: Accounts.BankAccounts.RoutingNumber
parameters.description: The routing number of your banking institution.

parameters.name: Accounts.TrustOrFundDetails.Name
parameters.description: The name of the Trust or Fund.

parameters.name: Accounts.TrustOrFundDetails.Abn
parameters.description: ABN of the Super Fund (rather than the corporate trustee) for corporate applicants.

parameters.name: Accounts.RegularContribution
parameters.description: Regular cash contributions to the SMA.

parameters.name: Accounts.RegularContribution.Amount
parameters.description: The amount of the regular contribution.

parameters.name: Accounts.RegularContribution.Method
parameters.description: ElectronicTransfer (not applicable for regular contribution) = 2, Cheque = 3, StandingOrder (for regular contribution only) = 4.

parameters.name: Accounts.RegularContribution.Frequency
parameters.description: Monthly = 1, ThreeMonthly = 3, SixMonthly = 6, Annually = 12, Quarterly = 13, HalfYearly = 14.

parameters.name: Accounts.RegularWithdrawal
parameters.description: Regular cash withdrawals from the SMA.

parameters.name: Accounts.RegularWithdrawal.Amount
parameters.description: The amount of the regular contribution.

parameters.name: Accounts.RegularWithdrawal.Method
parameters.description: ElectronicTransfer (not applicable for regular contribution) = 2, Cheque = 3, StandingOrder (for regular contribution only) = 4.

parameters.name: Accounts.RegularWithdrawal.Frequency
parameters.description: Monthly = 1, ThreeMonthly = 3, SixMonthly = 6, Annually = 12, Quarterly = 13, HalfYearly = 14.

parameters.name: Accounts.AccountType
parameters.description: Isa = 0, Gia = 1, OffshoreBond = 2, Qrops = 3, Rats = 4, Sipp = 5, PraemiumRetirementAccount = 6, Pera = 7, PersonalPension = 8, GroupSipp = 9, Ssas = 10, Jisa = 11, OnshoreBond = 12.

parameters.name: Accounts.Exclusions.Security
parameters.description: The security code of the exclusion.

parameters.name: Accounts.Exclusions.Security.Code
parameters.description: The security code of the security.

parameters.name: Accounts.Exclusions.Security.Exchange
parameters.description: The exchange code of the security.

parameters.name: AdviserId
parameters.description: The adviser ID to create the application under.

parameters.name: OwnerAdviserId
parameters.description: The owner adviser ID to create the application under.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 client ID provided by Praemium.

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 client secret provided by Praemium.

Type.description: FeeTable = 0, Contribution = 1, Establishment = 2, Termination = 3, Withdrawal = 4, Ongoing = 5.

Usage.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA.

Id.description: ModelId as returned by the Models endpoint.

AvailableAccountTypes.description: The type of account you would like to ope such as Isa/Sipp/RtsRats/Qrops/OffshoreBond

Code.description: The security code of the security.

Exchange.description: The exchange code of the security.

Security.description: The security code of the exclusion.

Applicants.description: Objects containing the applicant data. There must be at least one applicant for the request to succeed. The array of objects may contain a mix of Individual and Corporate applicants.

Accounts.description: Array of accounts to be opened with the application. Must be linked to an included applicant.

AdviserId.description: The adviser ID to create the application under.

OwnerAdviserId.description: The owner adviser ID to create the application under.

Status.description: Draft = 0, AwaitingSignature = 1, AwaitingApproval = 2, AwaitingFund = 3, Funded = 4, Trading = 5, ClosureRequested = 6, Closed = 7, Deleted = 8.

ApplicationId.description: Unique ApplicationID to be used as an application reference.
